mode_filter.description: Create a run only for cases matching a mode (automatic or manual)

priority_uuids_filter.description: Create a run only for cases matching a list of priority uuids

assignees_filter.description: Create a run only for cases matching a list of assignees

case_uuids_filter.description: Create a run only for cases matching a list of case uuids/short ids

description: Alerts have been added to or removed from a case
name: Case Alerts Updated

uuid.description: Unique identifier of the Case (UUID string).

short_id.description: Unique short identifier of the Case.

added_alerts.description: List of Unique identifier of new alerts (UUID string).

removed_alerts.description: List of Unique identifier of removed alerts (UUID string).
